titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on carbamic acid (U-9069).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/14/1997--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 1998, the duty on (3-((dimethylsomino) carbonyl)-2-pyridinyl sulfonyl)-phenyl ester (carbamic acid (U-9069)).
